document_title: Hepatitis C: Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Hepatitis C is caused by the hepatitis C virus (Hepatitis C Virus: HCV). Hepatitis C virus has very high genotypic variability. Currently, the medical community has identified 6 main genotypes numbered from 1 to 6. The main HCV genotype in patients in Vietnam is genotype 1, followed by genotypes 6, 2 and 3, respectively. Depending on the viral genotype, treatment recommendations will vary.
subsection_title: viem gan c.json. Cause of hepatitis C virus
subsection_data:
viem gan c.json. Cause of hepatitis C virus
Hepatitis C is caused by the hepatitis C virus (Hepatitis C Virus: HCV). Hepatitis C virus has very high genotypic variability. Currently, the medical community has identified 6 main genotypes numbered from 1 to 6. The main HCV genotype in patients in Vietnam is genotype 1, followed by genotypes 6, 2 and 3, respectively. Depending on the viral genotype, treatment recommendations will vary.
